title: Mini Show #2: Elizabeth Holmes Trial, MeToo CEO Resigns, Chicago Mechanics Strike, Purdue Pharma Settlement, and More!

itunes:title: Mini Show #2: Elizabeth Holmes Trial, MeToo CEO Resigns, Chicago Mechanics Strike, Purdue Pharma Settlement, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar discuss the abuse defense by Elizabeth Holmes, Time's Up CEO resigning after defending Cuomo, and the auto mechanics striking in Chicago. Then you will hear Saagar and Marshall break down the Purdue Pharma bankruptcy settlement and more!
